name: Dragon Ball Super: Eternal Rivals [Mid Term v1]
name_original: Dragon Ball Super: Eternal Rivals [Mid Term v1]
description:
Dragon Ball Super: Eternal Rivals [Mid Term v1] is an action game developed by RoqSolid. It came out on 29-03-2016.
You can play Dragon Ball Super: Eternal Rivals [Mid Term v1] on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
